original_text: And thou shalt command the priests that bear the ark of the covenant, saying, When ye are come to the brink of the water of Jordan, ye shall stand still in Jordan.
korean_text: 너는 언약궤를 멘 제사장들에게 명령하여 이르기를 너희가 요단 물 가에 이르거든 요단에 들어서라 하라

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt command the priests
that bear the ark of the covenant
When ye are come to the brink of the water of Jordan
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 요단 강물의 가장자리에 이르렀을 때

sentences.original_text: ye shall stand still in Jordan
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 요단 강 안에 서 있을 것이다
